text: [♪ theme song playing]

♪ Disney Chibis
With their own TV show ♪

♪ Together for the better
Or the worse ♪

♪ We mashed up every story
in a laboratory ♪

♪ Slash cut
to the Chibiverse ♪

♪ Disney Chibis
with their own TV show ♪

♪ A monumental cartoon
science first ♪

-♪ Does it all make sense? ♪
-Who cares?

[chorus singing]
♪ Disney presents
Chibi, Chibi, Chibi ♪
♪ Chibi, Chibiverse ♪

[scientist] Ah,
another beautiful day
in the Chibiverse.
The sun is shining...
The birds are singing...

-And of course, as always...
-[coughs]

[scientist] ...the Chibi
children are driving
the grown-ups crazy...
[all chattering indistinctly]
[grunts]

How am I supposed
to watch my stories
with all this noise?

It's against scientific code
for me to...
No!
Oops.

I think I just dropped
a crumb on the Chibiverse.

Eh, I'm sure
it won't change anything.
An island?
This changes everything!

A whole new land we can turn
into anything we want!

Ooh! What about
zip line island?

Ooh! What about
a roller coaster island?

Ooh! What about an island
where you zip line
to a roller coaster?

[Suga Mama] Or, instead of
those terrible ideas,

how about an island
just for grown-ups!?

I must say there's been
quite the commotion lately.

And an island for grown-ups
does sound mighty nice.
Huh?
Then it's settled.

Since we're the grown-ups
and we're in charge,

I declare that pile of what
I'm pretty sure is bread...

-[scientist]
It's pumpernickel...
-...to be grown-ups island.
[all cheering]

-No!
-No!
No!

[Cricket] Cannot believe
this is happening to us.
It's so unfair.

Don't they realize
when you tell a kid
they can't go somewhere

it only makes them want
to go there more!?

It's Kid Psychology 101,
people!

We can't take this
sitting down.

-No!
-Yeah, I won't stand for this!

Uh... So are we sitting
or standing?

We have to get on that island.
Whatever's happening there,
I just know...
It's amazing!

[singing] ♪ When we crash
Grown-Ups Island ♪
♪ Our dreams will come true! ♪

♪ There is so much
grown-up stuff ♪
♪ We'll be able to do ♪

-♪ Drive a car! ♪
-♪ Smash guitars! ♪
♪ Buy whatever we like! ♪

-♪ Stay up late! ♪
-♪ And lift weights! ♪

[both singing]
♪ Do tricks on motorbikes! ♪

♪ The grown-ups
need to own up ♪

♪ To the foolishness
they've done! ♪

♪ So we are gonna show up
And join in on all the fun! ♪
♪ Let's jet ski! ♪
♪ Drink coffee! ♪
♪ We'll eat candy galore! ♪

-♪ Grow a beard! ♪
-That one's weird.

♪ And watch movies
with gore! ♪

♪ When we get to
Grown-Ups Island ♪

♪ They'll regret
all that they did! ♪

♪ 'Cause the only thing
that's missing ♪
♪ Is us kids! ♪
All right, fellow youngins.

It looks like the island
is guarded by Vasquez.

So time for
"Operation Get Past Vasquez."

I'm sorry
I'm terrible with names.
[♪ upbeat music playing]
[screams]
[panting]
[screams]
[chuckles]
[all laughing and cheering]
[gasping]
[screaming]
[water splashes]
[♪ ominous music playing]
[all cheering]
I can't believe this!

We're never gonna make it
to Grown-Ups Island.

Vasquez stops us
at every turn.

Who would've thought getting
past a highly trained

and incredibly strong
bodyguard would be so hard??

-Huh?
-[laughing]

So maybe what we need
is some cloud cover.

[laughs] This is amazing!
Get ready, grown-ups!

We're over the island now.
Cricket, cut the balloons--

-Aye-aye!
-[all shouting]

I was gonna say
cut the balloons one by one
for a slow and safe descent!
That's my bad y'all.

Totally fair to be
mad about this.
My bad.

-[whistling]
-Huh?
Kids? What are you doing here?
Ha! I knew it!

You were all having
the time of your lives...
washing dishes?
Doing taxes?
And... napping?
[snoring]

Oh my gosh...
Grown-Ups Island is lame.

Well, of course it is. To you.
But to us, it's like heaven.
Ya see, kids,

sometimes adults just
need the space to do
boring grown up things,
like whittling.
Speak for yourself,

it's a thrill a minute
over here!
Wow, all this time

I thought we were
missing out on fun stuff!
Speaking of fun,

don't think we didn't notice
all the stuff you did
to try to get here.

The slingshot, the zipline,
the magic tiger.
Looked fun to me.
Huh. I guess it was kinda fun.

You don't need an island
to have a good time.

And who says ya can't
have a roller coaster
back at home?

Phineas and Ferb are literally
building one right now.

Wow. I guess you're right,
Hop Pop.

So whattaya say
you kids head back
to the mainland
and start having some kid fun,

unless you want to get in
on this Sudoku puzzle.
Math as a game?
Nope. I'm out.

-Time to go.
-[Cricket screams]

All right, adults,
the coast is clear!

Ha-ha! Time for the real
Grown-Ups Island.
[♪ music playing]

[Bill] ♪ That was all
just a ruse! ♪

[Hop Pop]
♪ Quite the story we spun! ♪

[Suga Mama]
♪ We can finally cut loose! ♪

[all singing]
♪ And enjoy our secret fun! ♪
Yay!

-[all cheering]
-All right!

[scientist] And so it appears
peace has once again been
restored to the Chibiverse.
[both grunting]

Everything is totally
back to--
[all gasping] Another island!

Yo, you gotta
stop eating over the--
[all] Chibiverse.
[♪ theme song playing]

♪ Disney Chibis
With their own TV show ♪

♪ Together for the better
Or the worse ♪

♪ We mashed up every story
in a laboratory ♪

♪ Slash cut
to the Chibiverse ♪

♪ Disney Chibis
with their own TV show ♪

♪ A monumental cartoon
science first ♪

-♪ Does it all make sense? ♪
-Who cares?

[chorus singing]
♪ Disney presents
Chibi, Chibi, Chibi ♪
♪ Chibi, Chibiverse ♪

It's a hot one
in the Chibiverse today,
thanks to my colleague

-who left the heater on
all night.
-Hmm...

[scientist]
And where better to cool off
than at the Chibiverse pool,

where Chibis of all stripes
gather together.

Our lovable dunces
sharing a snack.

Some wholesome sweethearts
dressing up their pets.

The big baddies wreaking
havoc per usual.
And here's three BFFs!

So psyched for
our Calamity Trio
synchronized swim routine.
It's gonna be perfect!
[giggles]
[sighs]

Hey Frowny McFrownFace.
You're blocking my sun.

Oh! Sorry. I'm just
so nervous about
our synchronized swim routine!

Anne and Sasha
are so coordinated,
and I'm, well--

-[groans]
-A bit of a klutz?

They want it
to be perfect,

and I don't wanna
let my besties down!

If only there was
some way to magically
become coordinated.

Wait, you could make me
coordinated, right?

I guess. But I've got
limited tanning time.

I'll hack into
all the billboards
in Chibiverse Square

and light 'em up
with photos of you!
[drums beating]

Here we are,
one Opposite Potion.

Guaranteed to make
any Chibi the opposite
of who they are.
Yeah! Oh, no.
[growling]
This is bad...

Eh, not really.
It only affected
the Chibis in the pool.
Cannonball!
No! No! No!

All these Chibis
turning into their opposites!

This could threaten the very
fabric of our universe!

Relax! We just
have to administer this!

Opposite-Opposite Potion
antidote.
Oh, phew, it's you!

Molly, you can help me
save the Chibiverse, right?

Oh, I would!
If I was Molly McGee...
But I'm Molly McMean!

And I'm gonna en-saddify
the Chibiverse!
[cackles]
Quick, we have to stop her!
But my tanning time!
[exclaims]

We have to
get that antidote
and set things right!

Before Molly can
execute her big plan!

Molly doesn't
have the power to en-saddify
the entire planet.
Duck!
But those do! Sob Goblins!

They'll suck
the joy out of anyone!

Ah! Tilly Scream
and Mabel Crimes!
My axis of evil is complete!
♪ It's time to ensaddify ♪

♪ So kiss
all your joy goodbye ♪

♪ Sob Goblins
will make you cry ♪
♪ Let's start the show! ♪

♪ Mabel will glitter bomb
This world to oblivion ♪

♪ All chaos
And no more calm... ♪
♪ Oh, what a throw! ♪
♪ Tilly's got spud grenades ♪
♪ No escapin' this air raid ♪

♪ All Chibis
Best be afraid... ♪
♪ Yeah, here we go! ♪

♪ Joy no more,
Sad to the core ♪

♪ Joy no more
Fun out the door ♪

♪ Joy no more
Whether foe or friend ♪
♪ Joy no more ♪
♪ Let the good times end! ♪

We gotta
get that antidote ASAP!
I'm tired.

Can we just give in
to Molly McMean?

I bet she'd help
make me the most famous
witch in the Chibiverse!

You can't be the most famous
witch in the Chibiverse if
there is no more Chibiverse!
Point taken.

If we're dealing
with nice Chibis
who are now supervillains...

then we need
to find supervillains
who are now nice!
Cover me! [groans]

You're really
not kidding about
being uncoordinated.
Andrias! Andrias! Andrias!

Molly, Tilly, and Mabel
are trying to destroy
the Chibiverse!

We need your help
to take them down!
No can do, Marcy.
We're peace-lovers...
who don't engage in fighting.
Oh, crud.

But we shall meditate on it,
and send positive vibes
into the Chibiverse!
[chants] Om...

Argh! These hippies
are no help.

If we can't rely on brawn,
we'll have to rely on brains.

And we've got the Chibiverse's
three brightest minds
at our disposal!

And now you want us
to come up with a plan

to stop them from destroying
the Chibiverse. Right?
Yes! Can you help us?

Of course we can.
We could do it in our sleep!
No need to be snooty about it.
[♪ upbeat music playing]
And voila!

Our "Antidote Reclamation
and Dissemination Stratagem".

You sure
about these brainiacs?

Makes sense to me.
Let's do it!
Ready, Scott?

Mabel! Isn't that
your grappling hook?
[shouts]
Barry! Now!
[grunts]
Got it!
[all exclaim happily]
[Marcy] It's working!
[screams]
Hey, Launchpad,

maybe we should wait
to take that until we--
[gasps] Land.
[all shouting]
I'm here! I'm here--
Whoa!

Guys, maybe it's best
if I sit this one out.

I'll just ruin the act
with my clumsiness.

[chuckles] Marcy!
We know you're clumsy.

But we love that about you!
You have to be
a part of our routine.

Really?
But I thought you wanted it
to be perfect!

The perfect
Calamity Trio routine.

Which means all three of us,
being perfectly us!
[chuckles] All right.
Let's do it!
[♪ epic music playing]
[groans]
It's so beautiful!
[♪ electronic music playing]
[all] Chibiverse!
[♪ theme song playing]

♪ Disney Chibis
With their own TV show ♪

♪ Together for the better
Or the worse ♪

♪ We mashed up every story
in a laboratory ♪

♪ Slash cut
to the Chibiverse ♪

♪ Disney Chibis
with their own TV show ♪

♪ A monumental cartoon
science first ♪

-♪ Does it all make sense? ♪
-Who cares?

[chorus singing]
♪ Disney presents
Chibi, Chibi, Chibi ♪
♪ Chibi, Chibiverse ♪

Hmm. Something is going on at
Scrooge McDuck's Money Bin.

Looks like he's upgrading
his defense measures.

I'm so confident
in my new foolproof
security system

that I'll give one million
Chibi coins to anyone
who can break into my vault!
[all gasping]

Many Chibis will try
and fail.
[shouts]

[scientist] But there's
one Chibi who might be
crazy enough to pull it off...

My whole life,
I've had one humble dream,
to rob Scrooge McDuck.

We've all had
that dream, right?
Pretty common dream?
[all agreeing]
That's why I've assembled you,
Stan's 11.

Well, 11 plus me, so 12.
Stan's 12.

Look if I was good at math
I wouldn't be planning heists.

Zombie girl here hacked
into the security blueprints.

There's only two ways
into the vault.

Through 10 miles
of backed up sewage,

or this series of
complex and deadly obstacles!

Oh, oh! I know this one!
It's the sewage!
Wrong. Not right at all.

This is why I do the planning.
Any questions?

Why is that dude yellow?
Like it's not a big deal,
it's just--

[whispers]
It's freaking me out.

[Stan] It's gonna
go down like this...

Soos, who was hired
as a janitor a week ago,
will sneak us in.

Now the vault
takes four keys to open

and each is
kept in a different,
booby-trapped location.

Which is why
we'll need to take care
of those security cameras.

Blue duck-beaver,
that's your department.

[Stan] We've only got
six and a half minutes

before that footage runs out
so we gotta be quick!
Ladies, it's time to dance.

Once the lasers
are deactivated
by these cheer children,
we'll enter

the flaming coal room
of hot flames.

We haven't named it,
but it's scary.
There's coal in there.

There's only one crazy
son of a gun who can walk over
hot coals like that.

Hot coals are no match
for these calluses!
[screaming]
Hot, hot, hot, hot!
[cat yowling]
Bingo-bango!
We're in.

[Stan] To get the second key,
we're resorting to witchcraft.

Hoot-hoot!
Did you say witchcraft?

I'm not going
to acknowledge you exist
in any way, shape or form.

Threw me off my game,
where was I? Heist! Heist!
We're in a heist.
We're resorting to witchcraft.
Dusty books, a pretty wink,

make these massive
losers shrink!

You're up Frog Boy!
Use your freak tongue
to grab that key!
[growling]

-[gasps]
-[Stan] Oh, boy.

leave it to Scrooge
to recruit Cerberus,
the three-headed dog from he--

I'm sorry, one second.
What am I allowed to say Here?

From Heck, the three-headed
dog from Heck.

Luckily, I know a kid
who has a way with animals.
[barking and growling]

Oh, my, what a lovely
demon dog you are.

And you.
Oh, and you as well.
[snoring]

[Stan] This next part,
no living person
could possibly survive!

-Good thing
you're already dead!
-[burps]

I can't do this
on a full stomach!

I gotta wait
at least half an hour
before any strenuous activity!
In you go!
[grunting]

Boy we have
really similar noses.

And if all goes
according to my plan,

we'll be diving into
those coins

before the looped footage
runs out!
[slurping]
[alarm ringing]

Everyone!
To the vault door! Run!
[♪ sitar music playing]
[Stan] This is it, folks!

Through that door is
everything I've ever wanted!

Get your coin
grabbing hands ready.
Huh?
[slow clap echoing]
Looks like you hit a wall...
Soos, what are you doing here?

And why are you ominously
slow clapping?

Oh, ho, ho,
but I am not Soos!
That's right, it's me!
[both] Scrooge McDuck!

[laughs] The one part
of the security system
you could never predict!
This is unbe-Chibi-lievable!

A week ago, I asked Soos
to deliver a package to
an address that doesn't exist.

A duck with a top hat
and no pants?

I will follow you
to the ends of the earth!
[cackles]

While I donned a disguise
and posed as your erstwhile
employee myself.

Then it was just a matter
of infiltrating your group,

letting you get your hopes up,
then foiling you
at the last second.
Checkmate, Stan Pines!
Bravo.

You think you've got it
all figured out, don't you?

Wait, why do you
get to slow clap?

No, no, no, no,
I get the slow clap, Stan!

Ah, but I'm not stan.
I'm his twin brother,
Ford!

This whole operation
was a mere distraction?

But where's...
Oh, no. He couldn't.
[buzzer sounds]
[cackling]

Didn't think I'd crawl
through 10 miles of sewage,
did ya, Scroogie?

Looks like I beat
your foolproof
security system after all!
I'm rich, whoo-hoo!

[spits] Oh yeah,
I could get used to this.

In fact,
I'm already used to it.

I'll never take
a regular bath ever again.
Yes, Stan.

Enjoy your
million Chibi coins.

I hope you've got
a sweet tooth...
Sweet tooth?
Chocolate?

Chocolate?
That's even better than gold!
[gobbling]
[burps loudly]

Curse you, McDuck!!!
[echoing]
[all] Chibiverse!
[♪ theme music playing]
